#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	long long int t,n,ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
		{cout<<"0\n";continue;}
		//n=n+1;
		ans=4*n*n-3*n;
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
}
